results.title: Studying the Effect of Taking Statins before Infection in the Severity Reduction of COVID-19 with Machine Learning
results.text_hl: According to the results, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ reduced @<m>DISEASE_COVID_19</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@COVID-19@@@ severity significantly.

results.title: Virtual screening, molecular docking studies and DFT calculations of FDA approved compounds similar to the non-nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor (NNRTI) efavirenz
results.text_hl: The results of the study showed that @CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@lovastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ might be considered as lead compounds for further development for @<m>DISEASE_COVID_19</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@COVID-19@@@ main protease inhibitors.

citations.NLM: Jordaan MA, Ebenezer O, Damoyi N, Shapi M. Virtual screening, molecular docking studies and DFT calculations of FDA approved compounds similar to the non-nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor (NNRTI) efavirenz Heliyon. 2020 Aug;6(8):e04642. PMID: 32802982

results.title: Direct activation of endothelial cells by SARS-CoV-2 nucleocapsid protein is blocked by Simvastatin
results.text_hl: Our results justify that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ may be more benefit for the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_COVID_19</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@COVID-19@@@ by potently suppressing endothelial activation.

results.title: Direct Activation of Endothelial Cells by SARS-CoV-2 Nucleocapsid Protein Is Blocked by Simvastatin
results.text_hl: Our results indicate that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ may be of more benefit for the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_COVID_19</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@COVID-19@@@ by potently suppressing endothelial activation.

results.title: Target-agnostic drug prediction integrated with medical record analysis uncovers differential associations of statins with increased survival in COVID-19 patients.
results.text_hl: In vitro testing of @<m>DISEASE_COVID_19</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@SARS-CoV-2 infected@@@ cells revealed @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ to be a potent direct inhibitor whereas most other statins were less effective.

results.title: Outpatient atorvastatin use and severe COVID-19 outcomes: A population-based study.
results.text_hl: The results of this real-world study suggest that chronic use of @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ (and to a lesser degree, of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@) is associated with a decrease in risk of severe @<m>DISEASE_COVID_19</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@COVID-19@@@ outcomes.
